question.content: My Suggestion is a bit too big for the suggestion and feedback Thing.... Should i still post it there? Cause i have like 1 Minute cooldown

referenced_message.content: That's not something I would even really have the authority to answer. These are all big picture considerations and priorities shift based on all kinds of factors. Part of my responsibility is to help give my teammates with the big picture in their head the most useful information to help decide. Of course, I also have my own personal beliefs and thoughts on these things and express that, but I trust the proverbial "forest" ranger while I work on the "trees". Which is my half-baked attempt to stretch the "forest vs trees" idiom way too far.

answer.content: You're free to express yourself constructively. That does sound more like a suggestion than a question though, yes. It's not something I have much basis to act upon - I've got features to ship right now. 😅
